text: Mayilpeeli is a 1992 Indian Malayalam film, directed by K.A. Devaraj, starring Sajan and Ashwin in the lead role. ==Cast== * Jagathy Sreekumar * Prathapachandran * Janardanan * MG Soman ==References== ==External links== * Category:1992 films Category:Indian films Category:1990s Malayalam-language films
title: Mayilpeeli
